seed_pair.known: I don't need to know everything.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Generated for S0045 with strict GATE compliance
4 long phrases (6+ LEGOs) per LEGO basket
P17 necessity pattern continued (I don't need)

practice_phrases: I don't need to learn Spanish
I don't need to think about it
I don't need to feel better today
I don't need to improve or learn more
no necesito mejorar o aprender más
I don't need to think about how to answer when you speak
no necesito pensar sobre cómo responder cuando hablas
I don't need to feel nearly ready to speak Spanish with other people
no necesito sentirme casi preparado para hablar español con otras personas
I wasn't thinking about what I don't need to learn yesterday
no estaba pensando sobre lo que no necesito aprender ayer
I feel as if I don't need to speak better than I can speak now
me siento como si no necesito hablar mejor que puedo hablar ahora
S0045L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0044 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: I wanted to know the answer
I need to know how to speak
I was starting to know how to answer yesterday
estaba comenzando a saber cómo responder ayer
I don't need to know what the answer is this morning
no necesito saber cuál es la respuesta esta mañana
I wanted to know how to speak Spanish better than I can speak now
quería saber cómo hablar español mejor que puedo hablar ahora
I feel as if I need to know how to improve as soon as I can
me siento como si necesito saber cómo mejorar tan pronto como pueda
S0045L02.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0045L01 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: I don't need to know everything
I wanted to learn everything yesterday
I need to think about everything when I'm trying to learn
necesito pensar sobre todo cuando estoy intentando aprender
I don't like to think about everything
no me gusta pensar sobre todo
I wanted to know everything but I don't need to improve now
quería saber todo pero no necesito mejorar ahora
I was starting to learn everything when I wanted to speak Spanish yesterday
estaba comenzando a aprender todo cuando quería hablar español ayer
I feel as if I need to know everything before I have to speak
me siento como si necesito saber todo antes de que tenga que hablar
I don't need to know everything.
